import React from 'react'
import { useState, ueEffect } from 'react'
import { Widgets } from "@mui/icons-material"
import '../style/Nav.css'
import { useSpring, animated, config } from 'react-spring'

/*
function Nav() {

    const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
    const props_menu = useSpring({ to: { opacity: 1 }, from: { opacity: -1 }, delay: 1000 })

  
        return isOpen ? (

            <
            div className = 'navbar_open' >

            <

            Widget1 <
            /li> <
            li className = 'navbarListItem' >
            <
            Widgets className = 'navbarIcon' / >
            Widget2 <
            /li> <
            li className = 'navbarListItem' >
            <
            Widgets className = 'navbarIcon' / >
            Widget3 <
            /li> <

            <

            Widget4 <
            /li> <
            li className = 'navbarListItem' >
            <

            <
            Widgets className = 'navbarIcon' / >
            Widget6 <
            /li> <
            /ul> <
            /div>        <
            /animated.div>     <
            /div>

        ) : (

            <
            div className = 'navbar_closed' >
            <
            h2 className = 'navbar-toggle-title'
            onClick = {
                () => setIsOpen(true) } >
            Ouvrir le menu <
            /h2> <
            /div>

        )

}


export default Nav;*/

function Nav() {

    const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
    const props_menu = useSpring({ to: { opacity: 1 }, from: { opacity: -1 }, delay: 1000 })


    return isOpen ? (

        <
        nav className = 'menu_container' >

        <
        h2 className = 'navbar-toggle-title'
        onClick = {
            () => setIsOpen(false) } >
        Fermer < /h2> <
        div className = 'menu_items' >
        <
        a href = "#" > Widget1 < /a> <
        a href = "#" > Widget2 < /a> <
        a href = "#" > Widget3 < /a> <
        a href = "#" > Widget4 < /a> <
        a href = "#" > Widget5 < /a> <
        a href = "#" > Widget6 < /a> <
        /div> <
        /nav>

    ) : (

        <
        div className = 'navbar_closed' >
        <
        h2 className = 'navbar-toggle-title'
        onClick = {
            () => setIsOpen(true) } >
        Ouvrir le menu < /h2>  <
        /div>

    )

}


export default Nav
